definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: Burnside had thrown his army against Lee's defensive positions six times.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩赛德已经让自己的部队六次冲向李的防御阵地了。

sentences.english: The star half-back jetted toward the goal line .
sentences.chinese: 那个球星中锋冲向球门线。

sentences.english: As the rocket sped toward Mulan and Shan-Yu, Mulan pinned Shan-Yu to the roof with his sword.
sentences.chinese: 火箭冲向屋顶上的木兰和单与，木兰正用剑指着单于。

sentences.english: I rushed for the door and fell over the cat in the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 我冲向门口，在过道踢到一只猫而摔了一跤。

sentences.english: A newly-discovered comet is plunging toward the sun and probably will not survive.
sentences.chinese: 一个新发现的彗星正在冲向太阳而且极可能不会幸存。

sentences.english: After that he rushed at the poor little lamb and ate it up.
sentences.chinese: 说完，他就冲向小山羊，把他吃掉了。

sentences.english: The river came roaring toward Long Ju's army.
sentences.chinese: 河水怒吼着冲向龙且的军队。

sentences.english: At this period, Ying white of the light pillar damage to cost a lumber moncler jackets rush by horizon.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，莹白的光柱突破花林，冲向天际。

sentences.english: Edgar sprang to his unbidden guest, blanched with astonishment and rage.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加冲向这位不速之客，脸色因惊愕与愤怒而发白。

sentences.english: Springing into the table with alacrity, he drew his sword and swung it upon skipper Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷的冲向桌子，拔出佩剑向杰克森船长挥去。

sentences.english: The procession came to a halt and security rushed to the trouble spot.
sentences.chinese: 行进队伍停下来，保安人员冲向了事发地点。

sentences.english: Airline executives should rush to the Haunted Mansion in the Magic Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司的经理们应该直接冲向魔幻世界的鬼屋。

sentences.english: Hit the road in this sporty green street machine with opening doors.
sentences.chinese: 打开车门，让此款花俏的绿色道路机器冲向道路中。

sentences.english: The tsunami drew a line of white fury across the ocean, heading toward the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 海啸画一条白线，狂怒地跨越海洋，冲向海岸线。

sentences.english: Some of these comets would have slammed into Earth, causing catastrophic results to life.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些彗星会冲向地球，给生物带来灾难性的后果。

sentences.english: We quickly picked up our javelins and spears and we ran at theJebusites.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我们迅速捡起标枪与鱼叉，冲向更多的敌人。

definition: to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
to jump up suddenly/to bound up/to rise up in one bound
to reassign sb to a different job/to turn around/to change direction/to make a U turn
to go straight to/to make a beeline for
